About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

Well hello there, I've been Expecting You!


Glad To Meet You. My Name Is Bharat Dave Nicknamed 'Lannymagnet'And I Am A Third Year Engineering Student For The Computer Science Enginerring, Who Absolutely Loves The Color Green.
As You Might Have Seen, I Am A 'CamelCase Writer.' Mostly Out Of Habit Though. My Hobbies Include Programming in C,C++,Java and Python As Well As Web Designing Using Html
And Css With Rarely A Tinge Of Javascript. OH! And also Gaming and Writing Novels, Can't Forget the Important Things Shall We? Check Out Few Other Details Further Below.

Studies

Content Writer

My Passion for Writing Rose When I Read A Lot Of Comics, Typically those of Isekai Standars, You Know, The 'Reincarnation' Types. I Immediately Got An Idea For Such A Comic and Started Writing "OCTAVES", My Firt Ever Novel. Hopefully You Might Have Read It By Now, If Not Go To The Project Section Immedaitely!

Web Designer

Front End Developer

Website Designing Woke A Burning Passion For Me, Something Greater Than An Inrest Or Hobby, Akin To Something Wonderful Work Of God.Learning About Various Features Of Web Designing, Brought Me To Create This Wonderful Mastepiece You Are Watching Today.

Programming

Computer Applications

Being A Computer Science Engineering Student, Programming Was Something That Was Like The Daily Food, Without Which You Are Nothing.Learning Programming Is Fun And Easy To Understand, And I Have A Eager Wish to Create A Software Program For the Betterment Of The Society.
